channel.title: SabsabiOnline
channel.description:
[b][size=14pt]SabsabiOnline[/size][/b]
[b]Base:[/b] RiotScape
[b]Introduction[/b] Well it all started out with me being bored and starting up a project called RS2007, from that point of the server developed further into using higher revision data, so we decided to change name from RS2007 to BioHazard, since RS2007 really doesn't work when the server are loading 634 data. And around a week ago somebody decided to rip my old server name; SabsabiOnline, which I wasn't too happy about, so I decided to go with SabsabiOnline, just to bring that guy down.
[b]Features[/b]
[ul][li]2 Quests[/li] [list] [li]Rune Mysteries (http://puu.sh/3JYRu.png)[/li] [li]Lost City (http://puu.sh/3JCmQ.png)[/li] [/list][/ul]
[ul][li]3 Miniquests[/li] [list] [li]Recipe of Disaster(http://puu.sh/3iuwk)[/li] [li]Desert treasure (http://puu.sh/3izxV)[/li] [li]Mage Arena ([url=http://puu.sh/3ERMM]http://puu.sh/3ERMM[/url])[/li] [/list] [li]8 Minigames[/li] [list] [li]Defender Games(http://puu.sh/3JvAS.png)[/li] [li]Warriors Guild(http://puu.sh/3jqr2)[/li] [li]Pest Control[/li] [li]Fight Caves[/li] [li]Fight Pits[/li] [li]Barrows[/li] [li]Mage Training Arena[/li] [li]Dungeoneering[/li] [/list] [li]Dungeoneering in-game highscores[/li] [li]Perfect smithing with the ability to smelt bars and smith items[/li] [li]Decent woodcutting[/li] [li]Almost perfect agility[/li] [li]Decent Mining[/li] [li]Decent fishing[/li] [li]Perfect cooking with a nice success formula[/li] [li]Ancient curses (http://puu.sh/3pz9i)[/li] [list] [li]Earning Potential[/li] [li]Ability to sell PVP Artefacts (http://puu.sh/3JvFK.png)[/li] [li]Almost perfect crafting (http://puu.sh/3CG7W)[/li] [li]Perfect clipping[/li] [list] [li]Clipped PVN[/li] [li]Clipped PVP[/li] [li]Clipped NVN[/li] [li]Clipped walking[/li] [/list] [li]7 Bosses[/li] [list] [li]King black dragon[/li] [li]Chaos Elemental[/li] [li]Coporeal Beast (http://puu.sh/3yxnj)[/li] [li]Tormented Demons[/li] [list] [li]Using transform mask[/li] [li]Switch prayer when damage > 31[/li] [/list] [li]Barrelchest[/li] [li]Kalphite Queen (http://puu.sh/3JvPO.png)[/li] [li]Dagganoth[/li] [/list] [li]Decent lottery system[/li] [/list][/ul]
[b]Media[/b] [img]http://puu.sh/3NH2d.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/3HaE1.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/3HaXC.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/3HaQm.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/3HaRI.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/3HaVs.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/3HaWi.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/3Hb1R.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/3Hb49.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/3Hb5x.png[/img]
[b]Gifs[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/gn74Zzc.gif[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/nt9t8gu.gif[/img]
[b]Videos[/b] [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RlEHJvIiuR4[/youtube]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f0yAr-Q4dQ8[/youtube]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fCxYPOYCzF8[/youtube]

item.title: SabsabiOnline
item.dc:creator: @Chronicles Chronicles
item.description:
@Chronicles wrote:

Updated thread fella’s

if u need help with this can always ask meh PI is to easy now in dayz :D

Java is Java, I don’t see how PI is specificly anything easier than most? If I had to say it’s more confusing due to the code being crammed everywhere, shitty formating and the worst kind of packaging I’ve seen ever.

Read full topic

item.title: SabsabiOnline
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

It would be great if you updated this to include things like goals, an update log, features that already exist.

Read full topic

item.title: SabsabiOnline
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

Pictures with links in them are considered advertisements if you haven’t had your website approved. I recommend you blur them out, or something to that effect. Nonetheless, I like the development so far, but I don’t really see anything outstanding yet. Nothing I can really call unique at all. I like the idea of the ranging guild, I once added it into one of my servers - but with everything working. Perhaps you could do this as well, as a unique feature. I also think that starting up a server to bring one down isn’t a proper start for a server. Though, that’s none of my business - your motives are yours. I will be following this, I hope you do good.

Read full topic

item.title: SabsabiOnline
item.dc:creator: @Chronicles Chronicles
item.description:
@Chronicles wrote:

[size=14pt]SabsabiOnline[/size]

Base: RiotScape

Introduction
Well it all started out with me being bored and starting up a project called RS2007, from that point of the server developed further into using higher revision data, so we decided to change name from RS2007 to BioHazard, since RS2007 really doesn’t work when the server are loading 634 data. And around a week ago somebody decided to rip my old server name; SabsabiOnline, which I wasn’t too happy about, so I decided to go with SabsabiOnline, just to bring that guy down.

Features

[ul][li]2 Quests[/li]
[list]
[li]Rune Mysteries (http://puu.sh/3JYRu.png)[/li]
[li]Lost City (http://puu.sh/3JCmQ.png)[/li]
[/list][/ul]

[ul][li]3 Miniquests[/li]
[list]
[li]Recipe of Disaster(http://puu.sh/3iuwk)[/li]
[li]Desert treasure (http://puu.sh/3izxV)[/li]
[li]Mage Arena (http://puu.sh/3ERMM)[/li]
[/list]
[li]8 Minigames[/li]
[list]
[li]Defender Games(http://puu.sh/3JvAS.png)[/li]
[li]Warriors Guild(http://puu.sh/3jqr2)[/li]
[li]Pest Control[/li]
[li]Fight Caves[/li]
[li]Fight Pits[/li]
[li]Barrows[/li]
[li]Mage Training Arena[/li]
[li]Dungeoneering[/li]
[/list]
[li]Dungeoneering in-game highscores[/li]
[li]Perfect smithing with the ability to smelt bars and smith items[/li]
[li]Decent woodcutting[/li]
[li]Almost perfect agility[/li]
[li]Decent Mining[/li]
[li]Decent fishing[/li]
[li]Perfect cooking with a nice success formula[/li]
[li]Ancient curses (http://puu.sh/3pz9i)[/li]
[list]
[li]Earning Potential[/li]
[li]Ability to sell PVP Artefacts (http://puu.sh/3JvFK.png)[/li]
[li]Almost perfect crafting (http://puu.sh/3CG7W)[/li]
[li]Perfect clipping[/li]
[list]
[li]Clipped PVN[/li]
[li]Clipped PVP[/li]
[li]Clipped NVN[/li]
[li]Clipped walking[/li]
[/list]
[li]7 Bosses[/li]
[list]
[li]King black dragon[/li]
[li]Chaos Elemental[/li]
[li]Coporeal Beast (http://puu.sh/3yxnj)[/li]
[li]Tormented Demons[/li]
[list]
[li]Using transform mask[/li]
[li]Switch prayer when damage > 31[/li]
[/list]
[li]Barrelchest[/li]
[li]Kalphite Queen (http://puu.sh/3JvPO.png)[/li]
[li]Dagganoth[/li]
[/list]
[li]Decent lottery system[/li]
[/list][/ul]
